meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>little</kanji> <kanji>woman</kanji> is a <vocabulary>girl</vocabulary>. 

少女 is a relatively formal word that's often used in writing to describe a <vocabulary>young girl</vocabulary>, usually between childhood and adolescence (or between the ages of about five and eighteen).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
